FuncDef: This command specifies the interval between each RADIUS Accounting Interim-Update message (minimum 5 minutes; maximum 180 days).

ParaDef.Info: specifies the interval in hours. Values-1 to 23.
Specifies the interval in minutes. Values-1 to 59.
specifies the interval in days. Values-1 to 180.

ExtraInfo: Default: no update-interval (do not send Accounting Interim-Update messages)
